title: goinstall must be able to build projects with $GOARCH and/or $GOOS specific code
body:
One way to do it would be to name source files appropriately, like we do at this moment
in syscall:

*_$GOOS.go for $GOOS specific code
*_$GOARCH.go for $GOARCH specific code
*_$GOOS_$GOARCH.go for $GOOS + $GOARCH specific code

Alex

PS: It is not something that I need at this moment, but would be nice if we could
establish the rule early.
